text: The Boatright House in Hopkinsville, Kentucky, located off U.S. Route 41, was built in 1808. It was listed on the National Register of Historic Places in 1979. It is significant as one of just two stone houses in Christian County. It is a one-story, two-room building (as is the other). With ==References== Category:National Register of Historic Places in Christian County, Kentucky Category:Buildings and structures completed in 1808
title: Boatright House
